name: The A-Mazing Gardener
description:
The A-Mazing Gardener small  game I made for an assessment in my game desgin diploma.

The A-Mazing  Gardener is a top-down puzzle game where you have to make your way through a maze, collect weed killer, fight off enemies until the time is up.

There are 8 unique ending as of now  & stat  tracking.

If you enjoy the game, let me know. If enough people enjoy the game ill add;

- Better  Graphics

- More Levels (Maybe procedural mazes)

- More Enemy types

- New Weapons

- Perks & Boosters

- Online leaderboards

- Better AI

If you  liked the game consider  leaving a  review or rating =)
